item.title: Why run?
item.description: Short Answer The short answer is: It makes me happy, it makes me better Not satisfied? Welcome to the long version… Long Answer I always hesitated to give a long answer in person. Mainly, because it required me to communicate so many things in a short amount of time and, most likely, I would not be able to find the best words to do so. Fortunately, smart people invented writing which allows us to be better at choosing the best words.
